title: #309 – John Carmack: Doom, Quake, VR, AGI, Programming, Video Games, and Rockets
description: John Carmack is a legendary programmer, co-founder of id Software, and lead programmer of many revolutionary video games including Wolfenstein 3D, Doom, Quake, and the Commander Keen series. He is also the founder of Armadillo Aerospace, and for many years the CTO of Oculus VR.
